name: 荣誉使者 慎
description: 慎是慰藉教团的最后一位依然在世的创始人。当世界陷入漠不关心和漫不经心时，他关闭了每座神庙，消失在黑暗中，直到玛尔扎哈复兴了慰藉教团。现在，慎从阴影中归来，担任教团最资深的导师，一位坚忍克己、正直而优雅并且值得所有人信赖的领导者。

wikiSkinData.distribution: Reward for finishing the ranked season with Honor level 5.
wikiSkinData.lore: Shen is the last surviving founder of the Order of Solace. He shuttered every temple when the world fell into apathy and carelessness, disappearing into obscurity until Malzahar revived the Order. Now returned from the shadows, Shen serves as its most senior teacher, a stoic leader of integrity and grace that all can rely on.
